typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	rootfolder as string ('mycontainer'),
	cdmfolder as string ('cdmfolder')
}
source(output(
		TransactionId as string,
		SalesChannelId as string,
		PurchasingChannelId as string,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionAmount as string,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount as string,
		TotalAdjustmentAmount as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		CustomerAccountId as string,
		TransactionTypeId as string,
		MerchantId as string,
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		LoyaltyProgramId as string,
		LoyaltyAccountId as string,
		StoreId as string,
		PaymentCardId as string,
		PointOfSaleId as string,
		TransactionClassificationId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: 'Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Transaction.cdm.json',
	entityPath: 'Transaction',
	local: true,
	folderPath: ($cdmfolder),
	fileSystem: ($rootfolder)) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		TransactionId,
		SalesChannelId,
		PurchasingChannelId,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp,
		TransactionAmount,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount,
		TotalAdjustmentAmount,
		CustomerId,
		CustomerAccountId,
		TransactionTypeId,
		MerchantId,
		IsoCurrencyCode,
		LoyaltyProgramId,
		LoyaltyAccountId,
		StoreId,
		PaymentCardId,
		PointOfSaleId,
		TransactionClassificationId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> sink1
